abstract: Procter & Gamble is in talks to buy part of Sara Lee’s international household products unit, sources told Bloomberg News.
snippet: Procter & Gamble is in talks to buy part of Sara Lee’s international household products unit, sources told Bloomberg News.
lead_paragraph: Procter & Gamble is in talks to buy part of Sara Lee’s international household products unit, Bloomberg News reported citing people familiar with the discussions.

headline.main: P.&G. Said to Seek Sara Lee Air-Care Unit
